Uses of Package
ojc.ahni.hyperneat

  • Packages that use ojc.ahni.hyperneat 
    Package Description
    com.anji.integration
    com.anji.integration contains classes that provide the glue between the various components of the system, including artificial neural net implementations, JGAP, NEAT, Log4J, and persistence and presentation layers.
    com.anji.neat
    com.anji.neat contains classes implementing NEAT framework, including genes, mutation operators, and fitness function used for XOR.
    com.anji.util
    com.anji.util contains utility classes used in the ANJI framework.
    ojc.ahni.experiments  
    ojc.ahni.experiments.objectrecognition  
    ojc.ahni.hyperneat  
    ojc.ahni.integration  
    org.jgapcustomised  
  • Classes in ojc.ahni.hyperneat used by com.anji.integration 
    Class and Description
    HyperNEATEvolver
    Configures and performs an AHNI evolutionary run.
  • Classes in ojc.ahni.hyperneat used by com.anji.neat

    Configures and performs an AHNI evolutionary run.
  • Classes in ojc.ahni.hyperneat used by com.anji.util 
    Class and Description
    HyperNEATEvolver
    Configures and performs an AHNI evolutionary run.
  • Classes in ojc.ahni.hyperneat used by ojc.ahni.experiments 
    Class and Description
    HyperNEATFitnessFunction
    Provides a base for fitness functions for use with HyperNEAT.
    HyperNEATTargetFitnessFunction
    Given a set of genotypes that encode a neural network, and a set of training examples consisting of input and target (desired) output pattern pairs, determines fitness based on how close the output of the network encoded by each genome is to the target output given some input.
  • Classes in ojc.ahni.hyperneat used by ojc.ahni.experiments.objectrecognition 
    Class and Description
    HyperNEATFitnessFunction
    Provides a base for fitness functions for use with HyperNEAT.
  • Classes in ojc.ahni.hyperneat used by ojc.ahni.hyperneat 
    Class and Description
    ESHyperNEATTranscriberBain.QuadPoint 
    ESHyperNEATTranscriberBain.TempConnection 
    GridNet 
    HyperNEATConfiguration
    Extension of NEAT configuration with HyperNEAT-specific features added: Forces correct number of inputs and outputs according to the number required for the CPPN in the initial ChromosomeMaterial sample from which an initial population is generated. Adds required hidden nodes to the initial ChromosomeMaterial sample from which an initial population is generated if HyperNEATTranscriber.HYPERNEAT_LEO_LOCALITY is enabled.
    HyperNEATEvolver
    Configures and performs an AHNI evolutionary run.
    HyperNEATFitnessFunction
    Provides a base for fitness functions for use with HyperNEAT.
    HyperNEATTranscriber
    To "transcribe" is to construct a phenotype from a genotype.
    HyperNEATTranscriber.CPPN
    Provides a wrapper for an Activator that represents a CPPN.
